entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 37 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Monday 16 January 2023
